channel.title: Tutorial Island
channel.description:
Hey guys, so some people want to know how to get tutorial island on their RSPS. So I am going to release something I just put together here.
UPPIT: http://uppit.com/wu4itxcc9md0/Tutorial_Island.rar
PICTURES:
[img]http://s1339.photobucket.com/user/godexserver/media/info_zps7956f896.png.html[/img] http://s1339.photobucket.com/user/godexserver/media/info_zps7956f896.png.html
LET ME KNOW IF ANYONE NEEDS HELP CODING THE TUT ISLAND INTO YOUR SERVER!

item.title: Tutorial Island
item.dc:creator: @GodexCAB GodexCAB
item.description:
@GodexCAB wrote:

[quote=“Lil_Smok3r, post:2, topic:517415”]You’re becoming like JoesServers…
This shouldn’t be a download. If i were you, I’d make this into a tutorial on HOW to add it.
It’ll help people much more instead of a little download which may look like it’s none of your work.
Other than that, Cool.[/quote]

Thank you for a suggestion, I appriciate it. I will make a tutorial on how to add it to the server very soon.

Read full topic
